mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT v.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY v.category_id ORDER BY v.video_uploaded_at DESC) AS rn FROM tb_video v WHERE v.useFlag = 'Y' ) AS ranked_videos WHERE ranked_videos.rn <= 4;
select * from tb_video v inner join tb_subject_categories s on v.category_id = s.sbj_id where v.video_id = #{id} and v.useFlag = 'Y'
select * from tb_video v inner join tb_subject_categories s on v.category_id = s.sbj_id where v.category_id = #{no} and useFlag = 'Y' order by video_uploaded_at desc
select * from tb_video where LOWER(video_title) like LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')) and useFlag = 'Y' order by video_uploaded_at desc
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_video SET cart = CASE WHEN cart = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END WHERE video_id = #{videoId}
